TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.SourceString:
Use this area to set up and manage your Hero teams. Your team has 6 slots:

- 1 Main Commander
- 1 Guest Commander
- 4 Heroes

Placement matters: 

- Heroes placed in the front row will shield the Hero behind them from incoming attacks.
- Assign one Hero as the Commander to activate their Commander Skill.
TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.LocalizedString:
Use this area to set up and manage your Hero teams. Your team has 6 slots:

- 1 Main Commander
- 1 Guest Commander
- 4 Heroes

Placement matters: 

- Heroes placed in the front row will shield the Hero behind them from incoming attacks.
- Assign one Hero as the Commander to activate their Commander Skill.

TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.SourceString: These are the Heroes and Pets you've collected.  They are available for slotting into teams.
TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.LocalizedString: These are the Heroes and Pets you've collected.  They are available for slotting into teams.

TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.SourceString: This shows detailed Hero information, such as class, stats, and abilities.
TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.LocalizedString: This shows detailed Hero information, such as class, stats, and abilities.

TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.SourceString: Check back regularly to upgrade, promote, and evolve your Heroes - it's essential for success.
TipBody_9_C20BB7AA48607972E4FED39D2AB034.LocalizedString: Check back regularly to upgrade, promote, and evolve your Heroes - it's essential for success.
